title: Inquiry for a Business tie-up in terms of Technology Transfer
content:
(I know that this is not right place to post this message since I am unable to locate appropriate contact of Google team. Please excuse.)
I have an Invention titled "Stereopsis Camera" and trying to transfer the technology. According to the Patent document "PCT/IN2020/050989"  that this technology fully depends on the Modifications to be done only at Lens arrangements. 
 The final video looks like
https://youtu.be/TRutUC-Hn_U. Kindly go through the video and provide the response if feel novelty to proceed.
